results.title: Changes in the Subchondral Bone, Visfatin, and Cartilage Biomarkers after Pharmacological Treatment of Experimental Osteoarthritis with Metformin and Alendronate
results.text_hl: In addition, treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Alendronate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019386 @@@alendronate@@@ as a monotherapy, or their combination lowered the level of some @<m>DISEASE_Cartilage_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002357 @@@cartilage@@@ biomarkers (CTX-II and @GENE_COMP @GENE_12845 @@@COMP@@@).

results.title: Metformin Attenuates Monosodium-Iodoacetate-Induced Osteoarthritis via Regulation of Pain Mediators and the Autophagy-Lysosomal Pathway
results.text_hl: The combined administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Celecoxib @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068579 @@@celecoxib@@@ controlled @<m>DISEASE_Cartilage_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002357 @@@cartilage damage@@@ more effectively than @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ alone.

results.title: Disease-Modifying Potential of Metformin and Alendronate in an Experimental Mouse Model of Osteoarthritis
results.text_hl: In addition, taking in account the histological analyses, we found that the combination of @CHEMICAL_Alendronate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019386 @@@alendronate@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may protect @<m>DISEASE_Cartilage_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002357 @@@cartilage destruction@@@ that occurs during @DISEASE_Osteoarthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@OA@@@.

results.title: Exploration of metformin as novel therapy for osteoarthritis: preventing cartilage degeneration and reducing pain behavior
results.text_hl: Exploration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as novel therapy for @DISEASE_Osteoarthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@osteoarthritis@@@: preventing @<m>DISEASE_Cartilage_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002357 @@@cartilage degeneration@@@ and reducing @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@ behavior

results.title: Metformin Attenuates the Inflammatory Response via the Regulation of Synovial M1 Macrophage in Osteoarthritis
results.text_hl: However, how @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ attenuates @<m>DISEASE_Cartilage_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002357 @@@cartilage degeneration@@@ is not clear.

results.title: Metformin limits osteoarthritis development and progression through activation of AMPK signalling
results.text_hl: The administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, commencing either before or after DMM surgery, caused significant reduction in @<m>DISEASE_Cartilage_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002357 @@@cartilage degradation@@@.

results.title: Rational engineering of ferritin nanocages for targeted therapy of osteoarthritis.
results.text_hl: It demonstrated that the CT-Fn/@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ could specifically bind to type II collagen, leading to the downregulation of catabolic markers of @DISEASE_Osteoarthritis @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@OA@@@ and promotion of @<m>DISEASE_Cartilage_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002357 @@@cartilage@@@-specific makers in @GENE_IL1B @GENE_3553 @@@IL-1beta@@@-induced chondrocytes.
